title: Self-Directed Flipped Learning-Based Professional Competency Enhancement Program in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in science and entry-level professional theories
context.additional_context: Offline blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), with project-based assessments to verify practical competencies.

learning_goals: Through flipped learning pre-study, learners understand 80% or more of core scientific theories (foundational knowledge, application cases)
Learners complete group projects applying scientific theories to real-world professional problems (medical/legal/technical)
Learners analyze three or more cases of scientific ethics and human-centered approaches (Human Dimension) through individual assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
